description: This file implements a ServiceLocator object that provides mock repositories for various data sources in an Android application. It enforces a mock-only mode to prevent external dependencies and network usage during development/testing.

methods.name: contentRepository
methods.description: Returns a mock ContentRepository instance and logs the mock mode activation once.

methods.name: metadataRepository
methods.description: Returns a mock MetadataRepository instance, requires context, and logs the mock mode activation once.

methods.name: assetsRepository
methods.description: Returns a mock AssetsRepository instance and logs the mock mode activation once.

methods.name: ratingRepository
methods.description: Returns a mock RatingRepository, optionally using application context for persistent storage; logs mock mode activation.

methods.name: useMocks
methods.description: Indicates that the application is running in mock mode, always returns true.

methods.name: logMockOnce
methods.description: Logs the mock mode message once, using FeatureFlags and Android's Log utility.
